trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance when an abnormal situation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 反常情况发生时，请终止正在运行的工作流实例。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] TerminateActivity immediately ends the execution of the current workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]TerminateActivity 立即结束当前的工作流实例的执行。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a suspended workflow instance, a terminated workflow instance can never be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 与不同的挂起的工作流实例，终止的工作流实例不能再恢复。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity"></xref> class.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>类</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>的实例的初始属性的值

|属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A>| null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 |</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity"></xref>类使用活动的名称。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Gets or sets an error message to report to administrators, providing the reason for termination.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要报告给管理员，提供终止的原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set when the activity is in runtime mode (the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode%2A> property is set to `false`) a <xref:System.Data.ReadOnlyException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在活动在运行时模式下时，如果设置此属性 (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode%2A>属性设置为`false`)<xref:System.Data.ReadOnlyException>引发。</xref:System.Data.ReadOnlyException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Propagation of this error message is determined by the host (the instance manager or the persistence provider).
trans-unit.target: 此错误消息的传播由宿主 （实例管理器或永久性提供程序） 确定。

trans-unit.source: An error message that provides the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 一条提供工作流实例终止的原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error*> property.
